stem: Which muscle is the exception to the rule that the tibial division of the sciatic nerve innervates the hamstrings?
rationale_correct: The short head of biceps femoris is innervated by the common fibular division, not tibial.

rationale_distractors.C: Long head of biceps femoris is tibial division.
rationale_distractors.E: Hamstring part of adductor magnus is tibial division.
